text: The following is a list of massacres that have occurred in Peru (numbers may be approximate): {|class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! style="width:120px;"|Name ! style="width:65px;"|Date ! style="width:120px;"|Location ! style="width:75px;"|Deaths !class="unsortable"|Notes |- |Accomarca massacre |August 14, 1985 |Accomarca, Ayacucho |47-74 | |- |Aucayacu massacre |August 6, 1986 |Accomarca, José Crespo Y Castillo District |10 | |- |Barrios Altos massacre |November 3, 1991 |Lima |15 |4 injured |- |Putis massacre |December 1984 |Putis, Santillana District |123 | |- |Lucanamarca massacre | April 3, 1983 |Lucanamarca |69 | |- |La Cantuta massacre |July 18, 1992 |Lima |10 |9 students and a professor were killed by government-affiliated death squads. |- |Santa massacre |May 2, 1992 |Santa Province, Ancash Region |9 | |- |} Peru Massacres * Category:Internal conflict in Peru
title: List of massacres in Peru
